verses.name: Deuteronomy 19:12
verses.text: Then the elders of his city shall send and fetch him thence, and deliver him into the hand of the avenger of blood, that he may die.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 19:13
verses.text: Thine eye shall not pity him, but thou shalt put away the guilt of innocent blood from Israel, that it may go well with thee.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 19:14
verses.text: Thou shalt not remove thy neighbour’s landmark, which they of old time have set in thine inheritance, which thou shalt inherit in the land that the Lord thy God giveth thee to possess it.
